api_key.name: Authorization
api_key.description:
All calls require HTTPS and an Authorization Key which will be provided by JUST EAT.

The key needs to be provided in the header as follows:

Authorization: JE-API-KEY {Your-Key-Here}

get.description: A delivery pool is a named group of drivers which deliver food for a set of restaurants.

name.description: The name of the pool, used by operations teams, in reports, etc.

restaurants.description: An array of JUST EAT restaurant ids served by the pool.

post.description: A delivery pool is a named group of drivers which deliver food for a set of restaurants.

name.description: The name of the pool, used by operations teams, in reports, etc.

restaurantIds.description: An array of JUST EAT restaurant ids served by the pool.

400.description: There was something invalid in your request - check response body for details

404.description: The pool could not be found

delete.description: The restaurants will no longer be associated with the pool.

patch.description: Modify a delivery pool, changing its name, restaurants or both

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request body should contain an object with either or  both of the properties. If a property is not specified then the  existing values are retained.

post.summary: Order is ready to be prepared

201.description: In the event of successful receipt of an Order, a 201 status code should be returned, indicating acknowledgement of transmission success.
